item.description:
SUNDAY FUNDAY!! Come on out and en"joy" the musical stylings of the wonderful Andy Joy! Andy plays accoustic covers of rock/top 40 hits.  He'll be playing from 7:00pm-11:00pm in the bar area.  I should be there about 6:30 or so.  Feel free to come and go as you please.

 

The Field is a wonderful irish bar conveniently located near the Central Square Red Line stop. ;)  The Field has an awesome patio area (bring a jacket! It's supposed to get chilly this weekend!), so you are free to mix and mingle inside and out. They boast a new menu but the food is always great. 

 

PLEASE NOTE: The Field is a CASH ONLY establishment.  No credit cards accepted.  Make sure you hit the bank beforehand. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drinks. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB.  This MeetUp has been crosslisted with Social Fun and Boston Happy Hour. 

 

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Live Music at The Field
